arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اِنِّيْ اُشْهِدُكَ اَنَّهُ مَا اَمْسَى بِيْ
translation: O Allah, I call You to witness that whatever enters this dawn and this dusk
that is with me of blessings and well-being
be they of my faith or of the world
are from You! There is no partner for You.
For You is all praise, and for You is the thanks which is upon me [to give]
until you are pleased and beyond that.
transliteration: allāhumma innī ush-hiduka annahu mā amsā bī
